short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement # W6399-21-CA06
description: The Contracting Party is seeking specialized equipment for procurement category Goods. Proposal must meet the requirements set out in the Supply Arrangement and the Request for Proposal documents. All vendors interested in submitting a proposal must be part of the Supply Arrangement # W6399-21-CA06
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Specialized Equipment #### Solicitation Information * **Reference Number:** W6399-25-FD21 * **Publication Date:** 2024-11-20 * **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-12-03T11:59:00 * **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-12-04 * **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31 #### Solicitation Details This solicitation is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement # W6399-21-CA06 for the procurement of specialized equipment. All holders of this Supply Arrangement will be emailed the RFP directly. **Eligibility Criteria** To be eligible to participate in this procurement, vendors must: * Hold a valid Supply Arrangement # W6399-21-CA06 * Meet the selection criteria outlined in the RFP **Evaluation Criteria** The proposal will be evaluated based on the criteria of Lowest Price. **Language of Tendering** Tendering will be conducted in English only. **Geographic Delivery** Delivery will take place within the National Capital Region (NCR). #### Supplier Information * **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence * **Contact Information:** + Craig Randell + [Craig.Randell@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Craig.Randell) + (613) 838-4756 * **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada #### Additional Information For more information or to obtain the steps required to be considered for Supply Arrangement # W6399-21-CA06, please contact the Supply Arrangement Contracting Officer at PSPC. #### Languages and Trade Agreements This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Documentation must be submitted in English only. Although not specified, it is assumed that French language documentation should also follow.

This tender is open and subject to change as per the respective documents shared above. The content is copyrighted, but open fully accessible at [gds-gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/access-to-information/domestic-buying-and-selling-site).

Note: I assume the Audience are vendors contracted and the above is rewritten in deviation with the government policy of transparency so as to be made available to the public. or for communication for any vendor intended to make
